modmenu.descriptionTranslation.ayame_pap:
Highly configurable PaperDoll mod.
Forked from Extra Player Renderer.
fml.menu.mods.info.description.ayame_pap:
Highly configurable PaperDoll mod.
Forked from Extra Player Renderer.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.rotation_u:
Allows player to freely rotate in any direction.

§eAll§r: Unlocks both head and body angles.
§eHead§r: Unlocks only the head angle.
§eBody§r: Unlocks only the body angle.
§eDisabled§r: Do not unlock.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.pitch.desc: Determines the vertical offset of head rotation in degrees.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.pitch_rang: Determines the number of degrees the head can rotate up or down.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.head_yaw.d: Determines the horizontal offset of head rotation in degrees.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.head_yaw_r: Determines the number of degrees the head can rotate left or right.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.body_yaw.d: Determines the horizontal offset of body rotation in degrees.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.body_yaw_r: Determines the number of degrees the body can rotate left or right.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.pose_offse:
Method of offsetting player's position when the player changes its pose.

§eAuto§r: Adjust height according to the height of entity's eyes.
§eManual§r: Manually set the offset when sneaking, swimming, using elytra and crawling.
§eForce Standing§r: Only renders in standing pose.
§eDisabled§r: No offset.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.sneak_offs:
Y offset when player is sneaking.

Works only when §aPosture Offset Method§r is set to §eManual§r.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.swim_crawl:
Y offset when player is swimming or crawling.

Works only when §aPosture Offset Method§r is set to §eManual§r.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.elytra_off:
Y offset when player is flying using an elytra.

Works only when §aPosture Offset Method§r is set to §eManual§r.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.pause_game: Pause the game when the configuration screen is open
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.disable_co: Disable background blur on the configuration screen
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.hurt_flash: If rendered model turns red when player takes damage.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.swing_hand: If the rendered hands swing when trying to break blocks.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.light_degr: The degree of light source producing shadow effects.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.use_world_: If use the light level in the world to render.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.world_ligh: Minimum brightness when useWorldLight is enabled.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.render_veh: Render the vehicle, does not work when §aPosture Offset Method§r is §eForce Standing§r.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.pause_game: Whether to pause the game when the configuration screen is open (effective in single-player only)
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.disable_co: Whether to display background blur on the configuration screen
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.hide_on_sc: Hide when a screen (e.g., game menu or inventory) is open
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.spectator_:
Automatically switch entity model in spectator mode.

Overrides §2Player Name§r option if enabled.
config.ayame_paperdoll.option.player_nam: The name of the player to render. It will be your name when left blank.
